name: cooking_setCourse
description: This function is used to set a specific cooking course on an appliance without starting it.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking course is being set.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking course is being set.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The cooking mode to be set on the device.

parameters.name: predefinedMode
parameters.description: The cooking predefined mode to be set on the device.

parameters.name: temperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of temperature (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).

parameters.name: cookingTemperature
parameters.description: The temperature to be set for the cooking course.

parameters.name: cookingTimer
parameters.description: The duration to be set for the cooking course.
